Instruction: Peel the papaya, remove the seeds, and dice it into small pieces.
Dice the red bell pepper and thinly slice the red onion.
In a bowl, combine the diced papaya, diced red bell pepper, thinly sliced red onion, and chopped cilantro.
Add lime juice and salt to taste.
Gently toss all ingredients together until well combined.
Refrigerate the salsa for at least 30 minutes before serving.
Serve chilled as a refreshing side dish or salsa with grilled meats or chips.
